title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 10.12 - Plumbing fixtures
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 10.12 - Plumbing fixtures

State Regulations

Plumbing fixtures shall be of impervious material and of a type which is readily cleanable. They shall be free from cracks and from parts which are not readily accessible for cleaning. They shall be of a type which does not constitute a hazard to a public water supply through back siphonage. Notes

10.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
